channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Planning Analytics Local
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Planning Analytics Local

item.title: CVE-2021-29739|2024-09-16T17:14:10.523Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a stack trace is returned in the browser. X-Force ID: 198846.

item.title: CVE-2018-1676|2024-09-16T18:28:54.443Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0.0 through 2.0.4 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 145118.

item.title: CVE-2021-29853|2024-09-16T17:08:26.215Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics 2.0 could expose information that could be used to to create attacks by not validating the return values from some methods or functions. IBM X-Force ID: 205529.

item.title: CVE-2020-4670|2024-09-16T20:32:43.965Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 connects to a Redis server. The Redis server, an in-memory data structure store, running on the remote host is not protected by password authentication. A remote attacker can exploit this to gain unauthorized access to the server. IBM X-Force ID: 186401.

item.title: CVE-2020-4669|2024-09-16T16:53:24.617Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 connects to a MongoDB server. MongoDB, a document-oriented database system, is listening on the remote port, and it is configured to allow connections without password authentication. A remote attacker can gain unauthorized access to the database. IBM X-Force ID: 184600.

item.title: CVE-2024-35143|2024-08-05T13:57:36.060Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 and 2.1 connects to a MongoDB server. MongoDB, a document-oriented database system, is listening on the remote port, and it is configured to allow connections without password authentication. A remote attacker can gain unauthorized access to the database. IBM X-Force ID: 292420.

item.title: CVE-2024-31907|2024-06-28T20:06:46.657Z -- ibm -- planning%20analytics%20local
item.description: IBM Planning Analytics Local 2.0 and 2.1 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 289889.
